description: All American inspired gourmet mini burgers rolling through Portland Oregon. Go Big Or Go Home Plate SlidersThis is a story, of a food truck named Home Plate Sliders….It started with a dream to combine America’s pastime and America’s favorite food. After the pieces finally fell together, and a long winter of hard work, Home Plate Sliders was born. Fueled by a passion for sports and fulfilled taste buds, this slider-servin’ restaurant on wheels rolls through the great city of Portland, Oregon. It’s mission: to bring some of the greatest things in life to some of the greatest people who live it.If you find yourself craving a mouth-watering gourmet burger with a little sports talk on the side, Home Plate Sliders is here to serve you. Step up to the Plate!
name: Home Plate Sliders
